ovdesc.p: As the details of withholdable payments and the tax withheld/refunded needs to be reported, a record of all the withholdable payments along with the details of tax withheld/adjusted will be maintained in this application. It is auto-updated by the system for all the withholdable payments and to hold all the pertinent details regarding the payment and tax.

desc.p: Client classification (FATCA STATUS) from FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO record.
The security master ID of the entitlement.
Event type of the entitlement
Depository from the entitlement record
Sub account from the entitlement record
Whether the withholding is done at source or local.
Value date of the entitlement
Event currency of the entitlement
Entitlement amount of the underlying entitlement record
Final WHT income on which tax is applied.
The rate at which the original tax is levied.
Tax amount of the entitlement
The customer account of the entitlement record
The currency of the account in the field Cu Acct No.
The net amount of the entitlement.
Tax account to which the tax amounts are originally posted
Tax amount posted to the account in the field TAX.ACCOUNT.
The tax amount in local currency.
Tax amount before offsetting the tax from SC.WHT.SOURCE.LOCAL application.
Tax amount after offsetting the tax from SC.WHT.SOURCE.LOCAL application.
Tax code used for offsetting given in SC.WHT.SOURCE.LOCAL application.
Tax rate used for offsetting given in SC.WHT.SOURCE.LOCAL application.
Value defaulted from TRANS.DATE field in SC.ADJ.TXN.UPDATE application. Associated multivalue from ADJ.DATE to ADJ.CU.ACCT fields.
Value defaulted from ADJ.TYPE field in SC.ADJ.TXN.UPDATE application. Associated multivalue from ADJ.DATE to ADJ.CU.ACCT fields.
Adjusted income of the current adjustment made in SC.ADJ.TXN.UPDATE application. Associated multivalue from ADJ.DATE to ADJ.CU.ACCT fields.
Adjusted tax amount of the current adjustment made in SC.ADJ.TXN.UPDATE application. Associated multivalue from ADJ.DATE to ADJ.CU.ACCT fields.
The revised tax rate from NEW.TAX.RATE field in SC.ADJ.TXN.UPDATE application. Associated multivalue from ADJ.DATE to ADJ.CU.ACCT fields.
FUNDS.TRANSFER id generated for current adjustment. Associated multivalue from ADJ.DATE to ADJ.CU.ACCT fields.
Customer account used for reimbursment. Associated multivalue from ADJ.DATE to ADJ.CU.ACCT fields.
Reimbursment account which is used to debit/credit to the customer account. Associated multivalue from ADJ.DATE to ADJ.CU.ACCT fields.
The adjusted income after taking into account all the adjustments to income above
The total tax amount in event currency after adding all the tax adjustment amounts from SC.ADJ.TXN.UPDATE application.
The total tax amount in local currency
Entitlement status
"LIVE" - updated when entitlement record is authorised from INA status
"REVE" - updated when entitlement record is reversed from RNA status
The customer in the entitlement record.
Entitlement id pertaining to this record
Rate type from DIARY record
Gross amount calculated based on the rate type of diary.Updated only for TXN.TAX.CODE with TAX.PARAM.FILE as FATCA.PARAMETER.
If the rate type in DIARY is NET then following calculation is
performed to get the GROSS.AMT
NET AMT of 7000 is converted into GROSS AMT of 10000 with 30% source tax
